Meteor falls in Russia, hundreds injured

News

Crippled cruise ship finally docks

A cruise ship disabled for five days in the Gulf docked late Thursday with some 4,200 passengers cheering the end to an ocean odyssey they say was marked by overflowing toilets, food shortages, and foul odors.

Personal Finance

10 reasons to not cosign a loan

Co-signing. Just the word makes those of us at Bankrate shudder because we've seen so many tales of co-signing gone wrong. Our go-to rule is, "Just don't do it!" Why? For the biggest and most important reason of all: The risk outweighs the benefits.
